home.subtitle: Premium sunflower oil producer - Homepage coming soon.

expertise.label: ABOUT US
expertise.title: Our Expertise
paragraphs: We are a producer of high-quality edible oils with a strong focus on sunflower oil and carefully selected raw materials. Our production process is built on consistency, quality control, and respect for natural ingredients.
From seed selection to final bottling, every step is carefully monitored to ensure purity, stability, and reliable performance in everyday cooking and professional use.
Our goal is simple — to deliver oils that meet high quality standards and earn long-term trust.

privateLabelSolutions.label: Private Label Solutions
privateLabelSolutions.subtitle: Your Brand. Our Expertise.
paragraphs: We offer comprehensive private label solutions for partners looking to develop or expand their edible oil portfolio under their own brand.
With modern production facilities, advanced quality control, and flexible packaging capabilities, we ensure reliable and high-quality products tailored to your market needs.

productionExcellence.title: Our Production Excellence
productionExcellence.subtitle: Where technology, quality and reliability come together

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing technology
manufacturing.description: Built with state-of-the-art technology and equipment from world-renowned manufacturers such as Alfa Laval (Sweden) and Kerting (Germany), ensuring precision and reliability in every stage of production.

refining.title: Refining the raw material
refining.description: Our refining process transforms raw sunflower oil into 100% premium quality oil, optimized for taste, purity, color and extended shelf life — meeting the highest consumer standards.

capacity.title: Daily capacity
capacity.description: With a daily capacity of 100 tons, OstrogLuna ensures consistent availability. Ready-made BISER cooking oil is stored in modern warehouses, prepared for fast distribution to customers.

productionInAction.title: Our Production in Action
productionInAction.subtitle: A closer look at our technology, processes and quality standards

productRange.title: Product Range
productRange.subtitle: High-quality oils under your private label

flexiblePackagingSolutions.title: Flexible Packaging Solutions
paragraphs: We offer a wide range of packaging options for crude and refined oils at competitive prices — from retail bottles and food service packs to bulk shipments.
As one of the leading exporters of packed oils in North Macedonia, we can meet high-volume demands at any time.
We provide fully customizable labels tailored to your market requirements. Private label production available for retail and catering partners.

items.production: Production, filling, and packaging under your brand
items.labeling: Labeling adapted to your market requirements
items.quality: Consistent quality control at every stage

certifications.title: Certifications
certifications.description: Our certifications demonstrate our dedication to quality, safety, and internationally recognized standards in edible oil production and packaging.

certificates.ifs: International food safety and quality standard
